text: Ivan Stepanovich Martynushkin (; born 18 January 1924) is a Russian World War II veteran. He is the last surviving liberator of the Auschwitz concentration camp, after the death of David Dushman in 2021. Martynushkin was born in Ryazan Governorate, then-Soviet Union. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Ivan Martynushkin
